entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ForeignKey on Entity without primary key #26468
  • How to create foreign keys using fluent API and Value Convertors #26465
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range when using AsSplitQuery() #26464
  • Why are Temporal Period properties required to be shadow properties? #26463
    7.0.0
  • Recursive CTE call in FromSqlRaw OR FromSqlInterpolated doesn't work in EF Core 5.0 #26462

Closed

  • Scaffolding a new migration with a custom operation type #26413
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor and COALESCE with more than two arguments #26344
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-ef CLI does not build dotnet user-secrets #26466
  • Idea / Feature Suggestion - Model First Development #26467
  • Self-referencing relationship breaks in `6.0.0-rc.2.21480.5` #26456
  • Table splitting and generated columns (specifically full text search) #26423
  • How to check if an entity is already being tracked by Ef Core? #26385
  • deps.json does not exists after update-databse in package manager console #26314
  • Database connection fails when the password is changed, but works when the application is restarted #26264
  • System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryableMethods' threw an exception. #25182
  • [Bug] Migrations "Could not drop constraint." exception after earlier foreign key exception during "Update-Database" #26453

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #26344 - SqlNullabilityProcessor and COALESCE with more than two arguments #26419

Updated

  • Check and update service lifetime docs #26445
  • Add Migration name check #26396
  • [6.0.1] Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [6.0.1] Register design-time LoggerFactory as Scoped #26460
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
